seo: 网康,防火墙,任意文件读取漏洞,被动检测
seo_en: Netentsec Firewall, Arbitrary File Read Vulnerability, Passive Detection
summary: 该插件用于检测网康下一代防火墙的后台任意文件读取漏洞，通过构造特定请求并分析响应内容来判断是否存在漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect the arbitrary file read vulnerability in Netentsec Next-Generation Firewall by constructing specific requests and analyzing the response content.
